name: Billiards Master Snooker Pool
description:
Billiards Master Snooker Pool is a classic billiards game that support both 8 balls and 9 balls as well as multi-player mode, which is most exciting part.

Amazing FEATURES:
Both classic 8 balls and 9 balls are supported
Impressive game graphics (beautiful pool) and amazing sound effect
Multi-player mode is supported, you can VS players all around the world
More than 60 levels are provided in Arcade mode, you’ll definitely love it

How to play:
Easy to play, drag the cue to adjust direction. Swipe the power slider to adjust power, and then release to strike.
Use rotation button to adjust direction slightly.

If you are a super pool billiards fan you won’t miss this classic snooker game
